title: Accidental Shooting in Toombs Co
content:
December 5-- According to Toombs County Sheriff Junior Kight, Saturday at approximately 9:15 P.M. Toombs County deputies responded to call from 907 John Dasher Road in reference to an accidental shooting.
When they arrived on the scene, Caleb Jarnard Stovall, twenty-one-year old black male of 8595 Julie Marie Circle in Jacksonville, FL was laying in the back yard with a gunshot wound to his right pelvis area.
Wittnesses said he had returned from hunting and reached into the back seat of the vehicle and pulled out a long gun by the barrel when it discharged shooting him in the pelvis.
He was flown to Memorial Hospital in Savannah where he is listed in stable condition.
